reviewText: The U.S. DVD is a truly awesome cheat; there are three episodes in this series, and this DVD simply omits the one about the age of piracy, even though it is referenced several times in the two included episodes. Thanks a lot for the ripoff BBC, a ripoff that is made even more infuriatingly ironic by the fact that thievery is the main subject of the series.

As documentaries go, this was pretty informative and the host was an excellent storyteller. I enjoyed it very much and was hoping to find more episodes. I have an inexhaustible fascination with history.
thought it was a movie but it was not also not worth the money it cost me would like to return it
